title: What are the copyright laws regarding music on TikTok videos? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: In the United States, there are no special copyright laws regarding music on TikTok. If you are interested in what current U.S. Copyright Law is, you can find it here: Copyright Law of the United States. However, all that most people need to know is that it is illegal in almost every country in the world to use music created by someone else without their permission.

David is correct. Copyright laws are standard and there are no special laws for various platforms. You cannot use a piece of music that has copyright protection without permission/license from the copyright holder and/or their representative.
